    • Method Detail

      • createStorageAccount

        public static StorageAccount createStorageAccount(StorageManagementClient storageManagementClient,
                                                  ResourceContext context)
                                           throws Exception
        Create a storage account based on the input parameters. Call blocks until either the storage account is created or an error occurs. Default values for the storage account create parameters are provided.
        Parameters:
        storageManagementClient - the storage management client object on which operations are performed
        context - information necessary for creating the storage account
        Returns:
        StorageAccount the storage account created, null if operation failed
        Throws:
        Exception - in the advent of a problem, the exception is thrown

      • createStorageAccount

        public static StorageAccount createStorageAccount(StorageManagementClient storageManagementClient,
                                                  ResourceContext context,
                                                  StorageAccountCreateParameters stoInput)
                                           throws Exception
        Create a storage account based on the input parameters. Call blocks until either the storage account is created or an error occurs.
        Parameters:
        storageManagementClient - the storage management client object on which operations are performed
        context - information necessary for creating the storage account
        stoInput - storage account specific parameters
        Returns:
        StorageAccount the storage account created, null if operation failed
        Throws:
        Exception - in the advent of a problem, the exception is thrown

                                               ResourceContext context)
                                        throws Exception
        Retrieve a storage account by name.
        Parameters:
        storageManagementClient - the storage management client object on which operations are performed
        context - information necessary for creating the storage account
        Returns:
        StorageAccount the storage account requested, null if not found
        Throws:
        Exception - in the advent of a problem, the exception is thrown

      • deleteStorageAccount

        public static boolean deleteStorageAccount(StorageManagementClient storageManagementClient,
                                           ResourceContext context)
                                    throws Exception
        Delete a storage account based on the input parameters. Call blocks until until the storage account is removed.
        Parameters:
        storageManagementClient - the storage management client object on which operations are performed
        context - information necessary for creating the storage account
        Returns:
        StorageAccount the storage account created, null if operation failed
        Throws:
        Exception - in the advent of a problem, the exception is thrown

      • listStorageAccounts

        public static List<StorageAccount> listStorageAccounts(StorageManagementClient storageManagementClient,
                                                       String resourceGroup)
                                                throws Exception
        Get list of storage accounts. If resourceGroup specified, only those in the resource group are returned, otherwise all of them in the subscription.
        Parameters:
        storageManagementClient - the storage management client object on which operations are performed
        resourceGroup - the name of the resource group, can be null
        Returns:
        StorageAccount the storage account created, null if operation failed
        Throws:
        Exception - in the advent of a problem, the exception is thrown

      • regenerateStorageAccountKey

        public static StorageAccountRegenerateKeyResponse regenerateStorageAccountKey(StorageManagementClient storageManagementClient,
                                                                              ResourceContext context,
                                                                              KeyName keyName)
                                                                       throws Exception
        Regenerate storage account key based on the input parameters. Call blocks until the key is regenerated.
        Parameters:
        storageManagementClient - the storage management client object on which operations are performed
        context - information necessary for creating the storage account
        keyName - storage account specific parameters
        Returns:
        StorageAccount the storage account created, null if operation failed
        Throws:
        Exception - in the advent of a problem, the exception is thrown

      • updateAccountTags

        public static StorageAccountUpdateResponse updateAccountTags(StorageManagementClient storageManagementClient,
                                                             ResourceContext context,
                                                             HashMap<String,String> tags)
                                                      throws Exception
        Update the tags for the storage account.
        Parameters:
        storageManagementClient - the storage management client object on which operations are performed
        context - information necessary for creating the storage account
        tags - hash map of tags to apply to storage account, or null to clear
        Returns:
        StorageAccountUpdateResponse the update response
        Throws:
        Exception - in the advent of a problem, the exception is thrown
